summary.title: Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma (DLBCL) PET-CT Staging
summary.abstract: Baseline and interim PET-CT scans for 400 DLBCL patients treated with R-CHOP. Includes Deauville scores and metabolic tumor volume calculations.

documentation.description: Baseline and interim PET-CT scans for 400 DLBCL patients treated with R-CHOP. Includes Deauville scores and metabolic tumor volume calculations. This is a dummy description generated for testing purposes.

project.projectName: DLBCL-PET: Molecular Imaging and Staging in Large B-Cell Lymphoma
project.leadResearchInstitute: Guy's and St Thomas' NHS Foundation Trust
project.projectScope: Baseline and interim PET-CT imaging datasets used for metabolic staging and treatment response assessment in DLBCL.
